properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 3:52PM EST until January 5 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...SW to W winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Friday to noon EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO NOON EST SUNDAY
